scripts.deploy:with-image: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const image=process.env.CONTAINER_IMAGE||'nginx:latest'; const template=fs.readFileSync('wrangler.template.jsonc','utf8'); fs.writeFileSync('wrangler.jsonc',template.replace('CONTAINER_IMAGE_PLACEHOLDER',image)); console.log('Deploying with image:',image);" && wrangler deploy
